title: Motor row & the auto show | College of Engineering | University of Illinois at Chicago
contents: Skip to the content of this page ,  the main menu , the site search form , the site home page .           College of Engineering     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  College of Engineering      College of Engineering   Main Menu    Undergraduate           Admitted Student Information    Admissions    Advising    Career Outcomes    Diversity    Engineering Expo    FAQ    Majors and Minors    Paid Internships    Scholarships    Student Groups    Student Resources    Women in Engineering         Graduate    Departments    Research           Interdisciplinary Research    Labs and Centers         Support UIC           Donate Online    How to Give    Help Students    Empower Faculty    Capital Projects         About           Dean    Faculty    Administration    Staff    Alumni    Advisory Board    Facilities    Summer Camp    News    Contact          Eyebrow menu    Give    Careers    Alumni    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                     Motor row & the auto show    Posted on January 05, 2018         story title      Join the UIC College of Engineering on Saturday, February 17, 2018 for brunch at Motor Row Brewing and an outing at the Chicago Auto Show. Connect with UIC Engineering alumni and meet UIC Motorsports—the College’s Society of Automotive Engineers—whose award-winning formula and baja cars will be on display for the sixth year in a row. Tickets are $25, which include brunch and admission to the Chicago Auto Show.  10:30 a.m. Enjoy Brunch at Motor Row Brewing (2337 South Michigan Avenue, Chicago IL 60616)  12:00 p.m. Meet UIC Motorsports at McCormick Place (2301 South King Drive, Chicago, IL 60616)  12:30 p.m. Explore the Chicago Auto Show  Suggested Parking: Southwest corner of McCormick Place Parking Lot A. Rate is $23 for up to 16 hours. The Chicago Auto Show is a 10-minute walk from Motor Row Brewing.  RSVP by Friday, February 9 and find more details here .  For more information, please contact Maurice Willis, Associate Director of Engagement & Participation, at mwilli60@uic.edu or (312) 996-9422.      Modified on August 11, 2019
